name: @aofl/picture
description: `` serves as a container for zero or more `` and one `` elements to provide versions of an image for different display sizes. Display size specific sources are defined using the media attribute of the `aofl-source` element. `` embeds an image into the document. It behaves similarly to `` with the addition of lazy loading images as they scroll near the visible area of the screen. The current formula is 2x height or width. In addition to this `` can be combined with `` and `` to provide different images for different display sizes. AoflSource component must be used as a child of aofl-picture and specifies images for different media queries.

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build-ci && npm run docs

author: Arian Khosravi <arian.khosravi@aofl.com>
